verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Speak <WH1696> unto <WH413> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and say <WH559> unto <WH413> them, When <WH3588> a man <WH376> shall make a singular <WH6381> vow, <WH5088> the persons <WH5315> shall be for the LORD <WH3068> by thy estimation. <WH6187>

And thy estimation <WH6187> shall be <WH1961> of the male <WH2145> from twenty years old <WH4480> <WH1121> <WH6242> <WH8141> even unto <WH5704> sixty <WH8346> years <WH8141> old, <WH1121> even thy estimation <WH6187> shall be <WH1961> fifty <WH2572> shekels <WH8255> of silver, <WH3701> after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary. <WH6944>
And if <WH518> it <WH1931> be a female, <WH5347> then thy estimation <WH6187> shall be <WH1961> thirty <WH7970> shekels. <WH8255>

And if <WH518> it be from five years old <WH4480> <WH1121> <WH2568> <WH8141> even unto <WH5704> twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old, <WH1121> then thy estimation <WH6187> shall be <WH1961> of the male <WH2145> twenty <WH6242> shekels, <WH8255> and for the female <WH5347> ten <WH6235> shekels. <WH8255>

And if <WH518> it be from a month old <WH4480> <WH1121> <WH2320> even unto <WH5704> five <WH2568> years <WH8141> old, <WH1121> then thy estimation <WH6187> shall be <WH1961> of the male <WH2145> five <WH2568> shekels <WH8255> of silver, <WH3701> and for the female <WH5347> thy estimation <WH6187> shall be three <WH7969> shekels <WH8255> of silver. <WH3701>

And if <WH518> it be from sixty years old <WH4480> <WH1121> <WH8346> <WH8141> and above; <WH4605> if <WH518> it be a male, <WH2145> then thy estimation <WH6187> shall be <WH1961> fifteen <WH2568> <WH6240> shekels, <WH8255> and for the female <WH5347> ten <WH6235> shekels. <WH8255>

But if <WH518> he <WH1931> be poorer <WH4134> than thy estimation, <WH4480> <WH6187> then he shall present himself <WH5975> before <WH6440> the priest, <WH3548> and the priest <WH3548> shall value <WH6186> him; according to <WH5921> <WH6310> <WH834> his ability <WH5381> <WH3027> that vowed <WH5087> shall the priest <WH3548> value <WH6186> him.

And if <WH518> it be a beast, <WH929> whereof <WH834> <WH4480> men bring <WH7126> an offering <WH7133> unto the LORD, <WH3068> all <WH3605> that <WH834> any man giveth <WH5414> of <WH4480> such unto the LORD <WH3068> shall be <WH1961> holy. <WH6944>

He shall not <WH3808> alter <WH2498> it, nor <WH3808> change <WH4171> it, a good <WH2896> for a bad, <WH7451> or <WH176> a bad <WH7451> for a good: <WH2896> and if <WH518> he shall at all change <WH4171> <WH4171> beast <WH929> for beast, <WH929> then it <WH1931> and the exchange <WH8545> thereof shall be <WH1961> holy. <WH6944>

And if <WH518> it be any <WH3605> unclean <WH2931> beast, <WH929> of which <WH834> <WH4480> they do not <WH3808> offer <WH7126> a sacrifice <WH7133> unto the LORD, <WH3068> then he shall present <WH5975> <WH853> the beast <WH929> before <WH6440> the priest: <WH3548>
And the priest <WH3548> shall value <WH6186> it, whether <WH996> it be good <WH2896> or bad: <WH7451> as thou valuest <WH6187> it, who art the priest, <WH3548> so <WH3651> shall it be. <WH1961>
But if <WH518> he will at all redeem <WH1350> <WH1350> it, then he shall add <WH3254> a fifth <WH2549> part thereof unto <WH5921> thy estimation. <WH6187>

And when <WH3588> a man <WH376> shall sanctify <WH6942> <WH853> his house <WH1004> to be holy <WH6944> unto the LORD, <WH3068> then the priest <WH3548> shall estimate <WH6186> it, whether <WH996> it be good <WH2896> or bad: <WH7451> as <WH834> the priest <WH3548> shall estimate <WH6186> it, so <WH3651> shall it stand. <WH6965>

And if <WH518> he that sanctified <WH6942> it will redeem <WH1350> <WH853> his house, <WH1004> then he shall add <WH3254> the fifth <WH2549> part of the money <WH3701> of thy estimation <WH6187> unto <WH5921> it, and it shall be <WH1961> his.

And if <WH518> a man <WH376> shall sanctify <WH6942> unto the LORD <WH3068> some part of a field <WH4480> <WH7704> of his possession, <WH272> then thy estimation <WH6187> shall be <WH1961> according to <WH6310> the seed <WH2233> thereof: a homer <WH2563> of barley <WH8184> seed <WH2233> shall be valued at fifty <WH2572> shekels <WH8255> of silver. <WH3701>
If <WH518> he sanctify <WH6942> his field <WH7704> from the year <WH4480> <WH8141> of jubilee, <WH3104> according to thy estimation <WH6187> it shall stand. <WH6965>

But if <WH518> he sanctify <WH6942> his field <WH7704> after <WH310> the jubilee, <WH3104> then the priest <WH3548> shall reckon <WH2803> unto him <WH853> the money <WH3701> according to <WH5921> <WH6310> the years <WH8141> that remain, <WH3498> even unto <WH5704> the year <WH8141> of the jubilee, <WH3104> and it shall be abated <WH1639> from thy estimation. <WH4480> <WH6187>

And if <WH518> he that sanctified <WH6942> <WH853> the field <WH7704> will in any wise redeem <WH1350> <WH1350> it, then he shall add <WH3254> the fifth <WH2549> part of the money <WH3701> of thy estimation <WH6187> unto <WH5921> it, and it shall be assured <WH6965> to him.

And if <WH518> he will not <WH3808> redeem <WH1350> <WH853> the field, <WH7704> or if <WH518> he have sold <WH4376> <WH853> the field <WH7704> to another <WH312> man, <WH376> it shall not <WH3808> be redeemed <WH1350> any more. <WH5750>

But the field, <WH7704> when it goeth out <WH3318> in the jubilee, <WH3104> shall be <WH1961> holy <WH6944> unto the LORD, <WH3068> as a field <WH7704> devoted; <WH2764> the possession <WH272> thereof shall be <WH1961> the priest's. <WH3548>

And if <WH518> a man sanctify <WH6942> unto the LORD <WH3068> <WH853> a field <WH7704> which he hath bought, <WH4736> which <WH834> is not <WH3808> of the fields <WH4480> <WH7704> of his possession; <WH272>

Then the priest <WH3548> shall reckon <WH2803> unto him <WH853> the worth <WH4373> of thy estimation, <WH6187> even unto <WH5704> the year <WH8141> of the jubilee: <WH3104> and he shall give <WH5414> <WH853> thine estimation <WH6187> in that <WH1931> day, <WH3117> as a holy thing <WH6944> unto the LORD. <WH3068>

In the year <WH8141> of the jubilee <WH3104> the field <WH7704> shall return <WH7725> unto him <WH834> of whom <WH4480> <WH854> it was bought, <WH7069> even to him to whom <WH834> the possession <WH272> of the land <WH776> did belong.
And all <WH3605> thy estimations <WH6187> shall be <WH1961> according to the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary: <WH6944> twenty <WH6242> gerahs <WH1626> shall be <WH1961> the shekel. <WH8255>

Only <WH389> the firstling <WH1060> of the beasts, <WH929> which <WH834> should be the LORD's <WH3068> firstling, <WH1069> no <WH3808> man <WH376> shall sanctify <WH6942> it; whether <WH518> it be ox, <WH7794> or <WH518> sheep: <WH7716> it <WH1931> is the LORD's. <WH3068>

And if <WH518> it be of an unclean <WH2931> beast, <WH929> then he shall redeem <WH6299> it according to thine estimation, <WH6187> and shall add <WH3254> a fifth <WH2549> part of it thereto: <WH5921> or if <WH518> it be not <WH3808> redeemed, <WH1350> then it shall be sold <WH4376> according to thy estimation. <WH6187>

Notwithstanding <WH389> no <WH3808> <WH3605> devoted thing, <WH2764> that <WH834> a man <WH376> shall devote <WH2763> unto the LORD <WH3068> of all <WH4480> <WH3605> that <WH834> he hath, both of man <WH4480> <WH120> and beast, <WH929> and of the field <WH4480> <WH7704> of his possession, <WH272> shall be sold <WH4376> or redeemed: <WH1350> every <WH3605> devoted thing <WH2764> is most holy <WH6944> <WH6944> unto the LORD. <WH3068>
None <WH3808> <WH3605> devoted, <WH2764> which <WH834> shall be devoted <WH2763> of <WH4480> men, <WH120> shall be redeemed; <WH6299> but shall surely be put to death. <WH4191> <WH4191>

And all <WH3605> the tithe <WH4643> of the land, <WH776> whether of the seed <WH4480> <WH2233> of the land, <WH776> or of the fruit <WH4480> <WH6529> of the tree, <WH6086> is the LORD's: <WH3068> it is holy <WH6944> unto the LORD. <WH3068>
And if <WH518> a man <WH376> will at all redeem <WH1350> <WH1350> aught of his tithes, <WH4480> <WH4643> he shall add <WH3254> thereto <WH5921> the fifth <WH2549> part thereof.

And concerning <WH3605> the tithe <WH4643> of the herd, <WH1241> or of the flock, <WH6629> even of whatsoever <WH3605> <WH834> passeth <WH5674> under <WH8478> the rod, <WH7626> the tenth <WH6224> shall be <WH1961> holy <WH6944> unto the LORD. <WH3068>

He shall not <WH3808> search <WH1239> whether <WH996> it be good <WH2896> or bad, <WH7451> neither <WH3808> shall he change <WH4171> it: and if <WH518> he change it at all, <WH4171> <WH4171> then both it <WH1931> and the change <WH8545> thereof shall be <WH1961> holy; <WH6944> it shall not <WH3808> be redeemed. <WH1350>

These <WH428> are the commandments, <WH4687> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH853> Moses <WH4872> for <WH413> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> in mount <WH2022> Sinai. <WH5514>
